body: Half-orcs from mountainous regions are excellent climbers, and sometimes ambush prey by leaping down from above. Half-orcs with this racial trait gain a +1 bonus on Acrobatics and Climb checks. This racial trait replaces the intimidating trait.
name: Rock Climber
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Races/Half-Orcs/Alternate Racial Traits/Rock Climber
